title: Potato queue
body: What if  people with similar loading speeds were more likely to be queued together? That way, a game of faster computers isn't halted by that one person loading from their potato!

replies.body: But slow load time = Still able to get in game at the same time as everyone else if you bugsplat or something + drink and food break.
the amount of coding and processing for such an insignificant problem would be wasted and alot of people would rather not allow a program to be able to access their computer specs
